channel.title: Server Status Page Spons Bidding
channel.description:
Ok, this time round i am planning to buy a sponsor server, i just wanted to clarafy a few thing's, i have bidded $65 and i seem to be the 1. Bidder, so i'm sure i'll get the sponsor. But i wanted to know a few things.
When they add me to the sponsor list, will they automatically add it under my name, becasue it seems another user as posted my vps ip adress with his name as owner, and when applying i pusted that same IP that the other user has put..
Will i get this account as the onwer? or will this resolve in compilcations? Just curious.

item.title: Server Status Page Spons Bidding
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Just PM Moparisthebest, prove that server is yours so mitb can tell this other guy to gtfo.
Your paying an outrageous amount of money a month for it so mitb would be more than happy to help you. (Thats what I would do).

How rich are you??

Read full topic
